Dialogue.Page: ENTRY 16
Another unusually cold winter, this is getting difficult to bear.
I'm worried our food stores are going to run out, we could never catch enough to feed us for this long...
The poor kids, this hunger is hard on them.
ENTRY 27
Nobody caught anything today. First the late thaw, now this!?
I guess the fish are having just as much difficulty with the cold as we are.
ENTRY 36
The climatologist in the southern village says this winter is going to be worse than the last one.
I don't know how we can survive this, we've had to start burning our furniture to keep warm...
I hear Sunfish spending more and more time on their experiments late at night, I worry about them.
ENTRY 40
I heard an explosion last night, and woke up to see Sunfish flying through the air on some sort of flaming device!
Salmon and Bass took an interest, they think this will somehow solve our problems.
I don't know how "spaceships" put food on the table.
ENTRY 46
Sunfish's experiments truly are a sight to witness.
They explode much less frequently now that Salmon is helping with management and Bass is piloting.
Maybe their spaceship can take us somewhere warm...
ENTRY 52
Bass landed their spaceship on another planet!
They radioed back and said the air is warm and breathable, and there's fresh water on the surface! And fish!
They say we should go there, but how will we all make it?
Entry 57
Salmon says we should pack as light as possible, that there isn't much room to spare.
I thought I would be sad to leave our old home behind, and all our things and our history...
But I'm just happy we're all alive.
